## IDebugWeakBroadcastEvent interface

Like [IBroadcastEvent](./rc-js-util.ibroadcastevent.md) but without holding strong references. Available in debug contexts only.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IDebugWeakBroadcastEvent<K extends string, TArgs extends unknown[]> 
```
